keyMoments.title: Officer Agents Gather at Spiders Café
keyMoments.description: The top-ranking officer agents of Baroque Works assemble at Spiders Café, answering the summons to meet their mysterious leader Mr. 0.
keyMoments.significance: Brings together all the major antagonists who will face the Straw Hats in the Arabasta Arc's climax, building toward the revelation of Mr. 0's identity.

keyMoments.title: Transport to Rain Dinners
keyMoments.description: The gathered officer agents are transported from Spiders Café to Rain Dinners casino in Rainbase for their meeting with Mr. 0.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up the next episode's revelation of Crocodile as Mr. 0 and the unveiling of his master plan.

goals.goal: Overthrow the Alabasta Kingdom and acquire the ancient weapon Pluton

reveals.information: The officer agents Mr. 1, Miss Doublefinger, Mr. 4, and Miss Merry Christmas are revealed as members
Baroque Works uses Spiders Café as a covert meeting location

keyMoments.title: Rebels Relocate to Katorea
keyMoments.description: It's revealed that the rebel army has moved from Yuba to the oasis town of Katorea and is preparing for their final assault on the capital Alubarna.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the rebellion is progressing rapidly and increasing the urgency for the Straw Hats to stop Crocodile's plan before civil war erupts.

goals.goal: Overthrow King Cobra and the royal family, believing them responsible for the drought

reveals.information: The rebel army has relocated from Yuba to Katorea
Koza is determined to proceed with the rebellion despite his father Toto's opposition
